oai_dc:dc.dc:title: History of American Academy of Veterinary Pharmacology and Therapeutics, 1981-1983
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Powers, Thomas E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: AAVPT
AVMA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: I assumed the presidency from Dr. Charles Short in 1981 during the AVMA meeting at St. Louis, Missouri. I received the reins of an organization that had been well founded and that was in a very healthy state. There were 2 critical issues discussed at this meeting: 1) to look into the need for a board in veterinary clinical pharmacology and 2) the possibility of special seminars limited to addressing the problems in the drug approval process. After "heated" discussions, both received approval by the narrowest of margins.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AAVPT Biennial Symposia; Sixth Biennial Symposium; 104-105
